definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)

sentences.english: Yang Yun, her son, in his childhood, liked reading his grandfather's unopened manuscript.
sentences.chinese: 其外孙杨恽从小爱读外公这部尚未公开的书稿。

sentences.english: My grandpa told me there was people coming for it each year.
sentences.chinese: 外公说，每年这里都会有收药材的人上山。

sentences.english: Sheldon: You know, when my grandfather died.
sentences.chinese: 你也知道，我外公去世以后。

sentences.english: My grandparents built a bamboo fence around their house.
sentences.chinese: 我的外公外婆在房子周围筑了一道竹篱。

sentences.english: Chengdu massage, my mother and I stood in Shenzhen station waiting for grandpa.
sentences.chinese: 成都保健按摩，我和妈妈站在深圳的车站等着外公。

sentences.english: Since my grandfather when the principal after his students are all good.
sentences.chinese: 自从外公当了校长后他的学生各个都是好样的。

sentences.english: Getting in the hay would be something grandpa couldn't do by himself.
sentences.chinese: 把干草收进来外公一个人是干不了的。

sentences.english: My grandfather was dying also and only survived her a few weeks.
sentences.chinese: 外公也时日无多，只比外婆多活了几个星期。

sentences.english: Grandpa had not knocked on my door, either.
Grandpa finally woke up, jingjing immediately began to cry.
sentences.chinese: 外公终于醒了过来，晶晶立马开始装哭起来。

sentences.english: If you petty temper, my grandfather also angry.
sentences.chinese: 你要是耍小脾气，外公也要生气的。

sentences.english: Grandpa load, immediately hit the ball with the racket.
sentences.chinese: 外公眼疾手快，立刻用球拍把球打了回来。

sentences.english: She liked her grandfather very much.
sentences.chinese: 小女孩非常喜欢她的外公缴。

sentences.english: His grordaddy is a few-bottle man.
I was with Mammaw and Papaw when Mother delivered by caesarean section.
sentences.chinese: 母亲剖腹生弟弟时，我同老外婆和外公待在一起。

definition: (informal) grandma (paternal grandmother)/(respectful) mistress of the house/CL:位[wei4]/(coll.) boobies/breasts
